short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Breeze through snoozing your tabs with plain English

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Give your browser (and yourself) some headspace!

Be more productive in your day-to-day online workspace by quickly snoozing non-pressing browser tabs to later times.

AnySnooze Chrome Extension suggests desired snooze date & time from just plain English, allowing you to snooze through each tab at the speed of thought. Each snooze can be annotated with a custom note so you can instantly regain context later.

➤ Example Snoozes
"Tomorrow 8am"
"In 2 days 5pm"
"2 weeks from now"
"Next Wednesday"
"This Weekend"
"In a month"
"Thursday Evening"
"10m" ->In 10 minutes
"2h" -> In 2 hours
"3w 9pm" -> In 3 weeks at 9pm

➤ What’s included?

~ Free
The free version of AnySnooze includes the core functionalities to help you snooze tabs quicker than ever before.
• Supports parsing dates & times in natural language
• A wide range of date & time shortcuts
• Recurring snoozes
• Annotate snoozes to quickly regain context later
• Date & time preferences for snoozing

~ AnySnooze+ (Sign up on our website to be notified of availability)
AnySnooze+ plan includes everything available for free, plus an expanded range of features to help you be more productive in your online workspace.
• Undo Last Snoozed
• Smart Snoozes: Pick from suggested snooze options based on your snoozing activity.
• Quick Snooze: Instantly snooze a recently un-snoozed tab
• Analytics: See usage patterns
• ...and many more features are being planned!
